config.searchable.category.edit_gamerule: The game rules editing screen, used during world creation.
config.searchable.option.edit_gamerules_: Whether game rule category names should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether game rule descriptions should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether game rule technical names should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether game rule technical names should be shown under their titles.
config.searchable.option.highlight_match: Whether the text that matches a search query should be highlighted.
config.searchable.option.keybinds_screen: Whether the keys bound to their respective key binds should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether key bind category names should be searched for matching text during a search.
config.searchable.option.reselect_last_s: Whether the latest selected option should remain selected after being hidden and later unhidden due to search query changes.
config.searchable.option.searchable_conf: Whether config category names should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether config option or category descriptions should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether config option technical names should be searched for matching text during a search.
Whether config option technical names should be shown under their titles.
config.searchable.option.select_server_s: Whether the server selection screen's title should be changed from §9"%s§9"§r to §9"%s§9"§r for consistency with the singleplayer world selection screen.
Whether server descriptions should be searched for matching text during a search.
config.searchable.option.select_world_sc: Whether world details should be searched for matching text during a search.
config.searchable.option.show_config_but: Whether a button to open Searchable's config screen should be added next to search boxes added or modified by Searchable.
config.searchable.title: Searchable Options
